item.title: How Not To Think Like Sherlock Holmes
item.description: If you’ve enjoyed my posts on How Not To Think Like Sherlock Holmes you would probably also enjoy my online course, also called “How Not To Think Like Sherlock Holmes” Come and discover the reasoning skills of the Master of Deduction. Just how does Sherlock Holmes come to his conclusions? How does he convince Scotland Yard that he is right? And is it wise of him to forget that the earth goes around the sun?
